channel.title: Pokemon Red/Blue Palette Editor
channel.description:
Well, I made this in around 7 hours (1 day), and am proud of the outcome. I made it in C# .NET, and it requires the .NET Framework 3.0. It also requires a Pokemon Red/Blue ROM. Do not ask me where to get one.
It does what the title says. You select the palettes from a list and edit the colors. Since the Gameboy Color has a 16-bit color engine, there's around 32,000 colors to choose from. You can either change the R/G/B properties of the color, or double click the color box and select the color, where it will be converted to 16-bit format.
Screenshot: [img]http://img5.imageshack.us/img5/3690/prbpe.png[/img]
Download as an attachment.
~Lin
